title: Bob Ross: Happy Accidents, Betrayal & Greed (With Surprise Guest!)
description:
Tig and Cheryl paint a picture of "Bob Ross: Happy Accidents, Betrayal & Greed"! Plus, an incredible SURPRISE GUEST makes an appearance-- you won't want to miss it! Our doc duo talks happy trees, May-December romances, chia pets, and much more. *this episode spills beans* get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
